      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Testing metals and non-metals: brittleness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfenmetalle und Nichtmetalle: 
Zerbrechlichkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Métaux et non-métaux de test : 
fragilité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Metais e não-metais testando: brittleness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metalli e metalloidi difficili: fragilità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκιμή των μετάλλων και των αμέταλλων: 
εφθραυστότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Metales y no metales de prueba: fragilidad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations showing some tests to find out whether copper, sulphur and carbon are metals or non-metals. This shows a test that identifies which material is brittle by observing which one breaks up easily when hit by a hammer.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brittleness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hammer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanical properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sulphur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Abbildungen, die einige Tests zu 
zeigen, finden heraus, ob Kupfer, Schwefel und Carbon Metalle oder 
Nichtmetalle ist. Dieses zeigt einen Test, der kennzeichnet, 
welches Material spröde ist, indem es beobachtet, welches oben leicht
bricht, wenn es durch einen Hammer geschlagen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le tiers de trois illustrations montrant quelques
essais à découvrent si le cuivre, le soufre et le carbone sont des 
métaux ou des non-métaux. Ceci montre un essai qui identifie 
quel matériel est fragile en observant le quel se casse vers le haut 
facilement une fois frappé par un marteau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O third de três ilustrações que mostram alguns 
testes a encontra para fora se o cobre, o enxôfre e o carbono são 
metais ou não-metais. Isto mostra um teste que identifique que 
material é frágil observando que quebra acima fàcilmente quando 
batido por um martelo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano alcune 
prove a scopre se il rame, lo zolfo ed il carbonio sono metalli o 
metalloidi. Ciò mostra una prova che identifica quale materiale
è fragile osservando quale si rompe facilmente in su una volta 
colpito da un martello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν μερικές 
δοκιμές για να ανακαλύψει εάν ο χαλκός, το θείο και ο άνθρακας 
είναι μέταλλα ή αμέταλλα. Αυτό εμφανίζει μια δοκιμή που 
προσδιορίζει ποιο υλικό είναι εύθραυστο με την παρατήρηση ποιου 
ένα χωρίζει χτυπιέται εύκολα όταν από ένα σφυρί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El tercero de tres ilustraciones que muestran 
algunas pruebas a descubre si el cobre, el sulfuro y el carbón son 
metales o no metales. Esto muestra una prueba que identifique 
qué material es quebradizo observando qué se rompe para arriba 
fácilmente cuando es golpeado por un martillo.</string>
          </description>
